Package org.neo4j.consistency.newchecker

Class CountsState

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neo4j.consistency.newchecker.CountsState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    class CountsState
extends Object
implements AutoCloseable
    Keeps observed counts when checking nodes and relationships. This counts state can then be checked against the counts store.

      • incrementRelationshipTypeCounts

        void incrementRelationshipTypeCounts​(RelationshipCounter counter,
                                     RelationshipRecord relationship)
        Increments counts for the given relationship, counts that revolve around the relationship type, not its nodes or node labels.
        Parameters:
        counter - RelationshipCounter used for incrementing.
        relationship - RelationshipRecord containing type information.

      • incrementRelationshipNodeCounts

        void incrementRelationshipNodeCounts​(RelationshipCounter counter,
                                     RelationshipRecord relationship,
                                     boolean processStartNode,
                                     boolean processEndNode)
        Increments counts for the given relationship, counts that revolve around the nodes and node labels.
        Parameters:
        counter - RelationshipCounter used for incrementing.
        relationship - RelationshipRecord containing type information.
        processStartNode - whether or not to increment counts for the start node.
        processEndNode - whether or not to increment counts for the end node.

      • labelIdArrayPos

        private long labelIdArrayPos​(int labelId)
        Valid label ids are [0,highLabelId) AND -1 (ANY_LABEL). -1 will be placed at highLabelId.
